concept.title: Debug Macros
concept.shortdesc: Describes the macros that can be used to debug the bootstrap.

conbody.p: The macro have no effect in non-debug builds of the bootstrap, when CFG_DebugBootRom is FALSE. These macros do not modify any registers, but they may modify flags. See Platform-Specific Configuration Header.

section.title: PRINT
section.p: Sends the quoted text string text to the debug port.

section.title: PRTLN
section.p: Appends a new-line character to the quoted text string text, and sends the resulting text to the debug port.

section.title: DWORD
section.p: Sends the quoted text string text to the debug port followed by the value of ARM general register reg as an 8 digit hexadecimal number followed by a new-line character.

section.title: MEMDUMP
section.p: Dumps an area of memory of length len starting at base, specified in hexadecimal, and sends it to the debug port.
